fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataTwoWayI.DataI

  • Packages that use DataTwoWayI.DataI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataTwoWayI.DataI DataTwoWayConnectorI.first2second(DataTwoWayI.DataI d)
      translates data as defined by the first two way interface into data as defined in the second two way interface.
      DataTwoWayI.DataI AbstractDataTwoWayConnector.first2second(DataTwoWayI.DataI d)
      Description This implementation of the method assumes that the concrete data class implements both DataI interfaces.

      translates data as defined by the second two way interface into data as defined in the first two way interface.

      Description This implementation of the method assumes that the concrete data class implements both DataI interfaces.
